ai-kv21.4:1.1_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:1.4_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:1.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv21.4:1.7_0: may those who dwell in the fruit of tree ...
ai-kv21.4:1.12_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:1.13_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv21.4:2.1_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:2.4_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:2.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv21.4:3.10_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:3.11_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv21.4:4.1_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:4.9_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:4.10_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv21.4:5.1_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:5.3_0: ‘Practice is liable to be reborn. I am not reborn in heaven.’ ...
ai-kv21.4:5.6_0: ‘I am liable to die, may I not die!’
ai-kv21.4:5.7_0: There is a wise man, or the disciples of the Buddha.
ai-kv21.4:5.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv21.4:6.2_0: “By the acquisition of Buddhas or those of disciples?”
ai-kv21.4:6.4_0: Pilindavaccha was asked by King Bimbisāra of Magadha, and he thought, “Friend Susīma, what you’ve learned?”
ai-kv21.4:6.6_0: And Pilindavaccha said, “The King is golden preparing the color of King Bimbisāra’s color. But he is summoned to behaved in gold.”
ai-kv21.4:6.7_0: “By the acquisition of Buddhas or those of disciples?”
ai-kv21.4:6.8_0: The account of the psychic powers is finished.
